goblin_cz wrote:
> Hallo,
> how is logged uris that exceed the max-length-bytes limit. I tried
> find this URI status code in source code (FetcherHTTP,Fetcher e.g.). I
> have to extract uri, that is bigger then limit (100MB).
> Thank you a lot.
> Adam Brokes

The status code is not changed, because (at least to a point) the 
document was still successfully fetched. Instead, an 'annotation' is 
added at the end of the crawl.log line.

For oversized resources, the annotation is 'lenTrunc' ("truncated by 
length").

Search for LENGTH_TRUNC (and similarly HEADER_TRUNC and TIMER_TRUNC) in 
FetchHTTP for more details.

Hope this helps,

- Gordon @ IA
